Yaniv is leading some of the team's most recent mobile efforts, including app-indexing reports and tools. Yaniv has also been part of the Google Trends, and Google Analytics teams. Prior to Google, Yaniv has worked on Nielsen Online's (formerly Buzzmetrics)  text mining and sentiment analysis engine.  He has completed his Masters in computational biology and machine learning, developing clustering and sequence alignment algorithms for protein function inference.

dcda4841-90dc-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.name: Zeina Oweis
dcda4841-90dc-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.bio: Zeina Oweis is a Product Manager on the Google Play Commerce team. She is responsible for both Consumer and Developer facing subscription and promotion features. Zeina is a graduate of Harvard College, and had worked at LinkedIn prior to joining Google.

dffe7257-86dc-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.name: Maru Ahues
dffe7257-86dc-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.bio: Maru is a Developer Advocate on the Google Developer Platform team. She leads the media partnerships team and gets to watch TV for a living. When she's not watching TV she loves coding, reading books and playing Lego with her kids.

e0e5733e-4add-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.name: Jeffrey Posnick
e0e5733e-4add-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.bio: Jeff's a member of the Developer Relations team at Google, focusing on the Open Web Platform.

e3a976ee-d1d4-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.name: Fabian Schlup
e3a976ee-d1d4-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.bio: Fabian is a software engineer on App Indexing and Search for Developers. He has worked on APIs and other developer products at Google for the last five years, including as a technical lead for the Google+ Platform and Google Calendar APIs. Fabian has a Masters degree in Computer Science from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology.

e87fe1e8-48dd-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.name: Paul Lewis
e87fe1e8-48dd-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.bio: Paul spends the majority of his time helping developers to create web apps that load in under 1 second, and run at a silky smooth 60fps. Prior to Google, he spent over a decade building sites and apps for companies such as Land Rover, BBC, HTC, Red Bull and CBS. Paul holds a bachelor's degree in Computer Science from Newcastle University, UK, and went bald much earlier than anyone could have reasonably anticipated.

ef328f20-d2d4-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.name: Michael Fink
ef328f20-d2d4-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.bio: Michael is the Product Manager of the Google Search Console.  Prior to his role as a product manager, Michael focused on interactive media and is known as the inventor of YouTube's video annotations. Michael originally joined Google Research exactly one decade ago, while working on his PHD in Machine Learning and Computational Neuroscience.

f3243d4d-dcd8-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.name: Todd Kerpelman
f3243d4d-dcd8-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.bio: Todd Kerpelman used to be a halfway decent game designer, until he tricked Google into hiring him on as a Developer Advocate, and now he spends his time making YouTube videos about iOS related things. He figures it's just a matter of time until they discover he doesn't know what he's talking about, so he's stockpiling snacks in the meantime.

f6ccef1d-bcd4-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.name: Andrew Bunner
f6ccef1d-bcd4-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.bio: Andrew is the engineering lead for Nearby. Prior to joining Google, Andrew was Director of Engineering at Six Apart and a number of Bay Area start-ups where he built high-volume serving and analytic systems. He holds a bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champagne.

f9628224-aedc-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.name: Ranjith Jayaram
f9628224-aedc-e411-b87f-00155d5066d7.bio: Ranjith Jayaram is a Product Manager at Google, where he works on solutions for app distribution and engagement. He has worked as a PM on developer products such as Google Sign-In and Google+ APIs. Prior to becoming a PM, Ranjith was a Software Engineer in Ads, where he launched several mobile app install ad products. His engineering experience includes working in the R&D division of Qualcomm, where he focused on a variety of mobile technologies. He holds a Masters in Computer Science from North Carolina State University. In his spare time, he enjoys writing fiction.
